title: Love Isn't Blind: A Sweet and Special Romances Collection
description: A sweet, romantic story about finding love using the eyes of the heart. When Ashley met talented writer Anthony Lang, she fell in love with him at first sight. How could she not when he has everything she wanted in a man--attractive, intelligent, witty and kind? The only problem was that he was blind, and not because of that, really. But because he felt it made him a burden to any woman who would love him. But Ashley was persistent. She knew that finding true love didn't always happen in a lifetime, and she has found hers in him. But if only she could make him realize that he has found his love, his chance of happiness, in her, too. Would he see reason with his heart, or has it become blind, too?
author: Sandra Ross
